com.betleopard.domain

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betleopard.domain.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONSerializable, LongIndexed, java.io.Serializable

    public final class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSONSerializable
    An event represents a collection of Race instances - effectively a race meeting. Like other domain objects, it is immutable and JSONSerializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
